```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


## Load the Data
```{r}
biomass <- read_csv("../input/UCD2023_2024_Data/Biomass_20250721 - Sheet1.csv") %>% 
  select(unique.ID=`Unique ID`, date.collected, date.meas, total.biomass_g, total.seed.mass_g, survey.notes)

genotype_info <- read_csv("../input/UCD2023_2024_Data/Genotypes_2023_2024.csv") %>% 
  select(block, unique.ID)
```

## Merge
```{r}
names(biomass)
names(genotype_info)

biomass_blocks <- biomass %>% 
  left_join(genotype_info) %>% 
  select(block, unique.ID:survey.notes) %>% 
  arrange(block, unique.ID, date.meas)
biomass_blocks
write_csv(biomass_blocks, "../output/UCD_Traits/Biomass_Blocks.csv")
```
